text:
Hey Everyone! :wave:

I’ve put together a new template that I want to use for an existing live page (our homepage).  Is the best way to make this update to just change the template of the existing page in it’s settings? I assume I can make this change and test it as a preview page without publishing? Is there any way to easily revert back to the old template (along with any inserted module content)?

Thank you :pray:
